ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.datasets
Class ScatteredDatasetSampleEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.AbstractSampleQueueManager
      ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.datasets.DatasetSampleEvaluator
          ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.datasets.ScatteredDatasetSampleEvaluator
All Implemented Interfaces:
SampleEvaluator
public class ScatteredDatasetSampleEvaluator
extends DatasetSampleEvaluator

This class implements a scattered dataset lookup sample evaluator. When given a sample point, this evaluator looks in a KDTree for a simulation of a point as close to the given point as possible. It returns the output parameters at the closest point, and changes the input parameters to match the closest point that was used.

Author:
Wouter Hendrickx
